item.title: Need help with making a portal do something
item.description:
@4593125 wrote:

So Tell me if I’m right. Where you wrote 1, 57 those are item ids. I will replace those with the ids of the items I want included. Where you wrote 850000, 100000 those are their prices. I will replace those with the prices I want. When I do that it’ll work?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making a portal do something

item.title: Need help with making a portal do something
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[code] case 7315:
if (playerIsMember < 1)
{
sendMessage(“You need to be a member to do this!”);
break;
}
int[] a =
{
1, 57
};
int[] b =
{
850000, 100000
};
int c = 0;

	for (int i : a)
	{
		if (playerHasItem(i))
		{
			deleteItem(i, getItemSlot(i), 1);
			addItem(995, b[c]);
		}
		c++;
	}
	break;[/code]

Example;

Item 1 would sell for 850,000 gold, and item 57 would sell for 100,000.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with making a portal do something
item.description:
@4593125 wrote:

When I try that I get this error:

client.java:3956: GetItemShopValue(int,int,int) in client cannot be applied to ( int) addItem(995, GetItemShopValue(9800)); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Note: server.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

I think it means I need two more ints in the method. What are they?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with making a portal do something
item.description:
@4593125 wrote:

Whenever I do that i get this error:

client.java:3956: cannot find symbol symbol : method getShopValue(int) location: class client addItem(995, getShopValue(9800)); //not sure the exact method there ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Note: server.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

I know what that error means, it means the method is wrong. So what is the right method? Or is there another way to make it work?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making a portal do something

item.title: Need help with making a portal do something
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Noooooo dude. Use the shopValues, and loop through the inventory, and just have them bank items they don’t want to sell (or you could loop through an array). So something like this…

if(playerHasItem(i)) { deleteItem(i, getItemSlot(i), 1); addItem(995, getShopValue(i)); //not sure the exact method there }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making a portal do something

item.title: Need help with making a portal do something
item.description:
@4593125 wrote:

I am trying to make a portal that gives money for certain a certain item. For example, you will walk in with a red partyhat and a green partyhat and it will give you the money that those items are worth when it teleports you.

This is the code i have made so far:

case 7315: // New MiniGame Portal if(playerIsMember == 1) { if(playerHasItemAmount(9800, 1 )); deleteItem(9800, getItemSlot(9800), 1); addItem(995, 1000000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9801, 1 )); deleteItem(9801, getItemSlot(9801), 1); addItem(995, 1000000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9802, 1 )); deleteItem(9803, getItemSlot(9802), 1); addItem(995, 2000000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9803, 1 )); deleteItem(9803, getItemSlot(9803), 1); addItem(995, 2000000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9804, 1 )); deleteItem(9804, getItemSlot(9804), 1); addItem(995, 1000000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9805, 1 )); deleteItem(9805, getItemSlot(9805), 1); addItem(995, 1000000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9806, 1 )); deleteItem(9806, getItemSlot(9806), 1); addItem(995, 1500000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9807, 1 )); deleteItem(9807, getItemSlot(9807), 1); addItem(995, 1000000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9808, 1 )); deleteItem(9808, getItemSlot(9808), 1); addItem(995, 1000000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9809, 1 )); deleteItem(9809, getItemSlot(9809), 1); addItem(995, 1000000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9810, 1 )); deleteItem(9810, getItemSlot(9810), 1); addItem(995, 1000000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9811, 1 )); deleteItem(9811, getItemSlot(9811), 1); addItem(995, 1500000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9812, 1 )); deleteItem(9812, getItemSlot(9812), 1); addItem(995, 1500000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(8459, 1 )); deleteItem(8459, getItemSlot(8459), 1); addItem(995, 350000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(1530, 1 )); deleteItem(1530, getItemSlot(1530), 1); addItem(995, 300000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(1532, 1 )); deleteItem(1532, getItemSlot(1532), 1); addItem(995, 200000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(1549, 1 )); deleteItem(1549, getItemSlot(1549), 1); addItem(995, 250000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(1548, 1 )); deleteItem(1548, getItemSlot(1548), 1); addItem(995, 250000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(1533, 1 )); deleteItem(1533, getItemSlot(1533), 1); addItem(995, 275000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(1531, 1 )); deleteItem(1531, getItemSlot(1531), 1); addItem(995, 250000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9117, 1 )); deleteItem(9117, getItemSlot(9117), 1); addItem(995, 750000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9118, 1 )); deleteItem(9118, getItemSlot(9118), 1); addItem(995, 250000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9106, 1 )); deleteItem(9106, getItemSlot(9106), 1); addItem(995, 160000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10103, 1 )); deleteItem(10103, getItemSlot(1013), 1); addItem(995, 160000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10106, 1 )); deleteItem(10106, getItemSlot(10106), 1); addItem(995, 160000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10105, 1 )); deleteItem(10105, getItemSlot(10105), 1); addItem(995, 160000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10100, 1 )); deleteItem(10100, getItemSlot(10100), 1); addItem(995, 160000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10101, 1 )); deleteItem(10101, getItemSlot(10101), 1); addItem(995, 160000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10102, 1 )); deleteItem(10102, getItemSlot(10102), 1); addItem(995, 160000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(9091, 1 )); deleteItem(9091, getItemSlot(9091), 1); addItem(995, 172000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10110, 1 )); deleteItem(10110, getItemSlot(10100), 1); addItem(995, 200000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10111, 1 )); deleteItem(10111, getItemSlot(10111), 1); addItem(995, 117000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10109, 1 )); deleteItem(10109, getItemSlot(10109), 1); addItem(995, 920000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10117, 1 )); deleteItem(10117, getItemSlot(10117), 1); addItem(995, 270000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10118, 1 )); deleteItem(10118, getItemSlot(10118), 1); addItem(995, 231000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10116, 1 )); deleteItem(10116, getItemSlot(10116), 1); addItem(995, 300000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10115, 1 )); deleteItem(10115, getItemSlot(10115), 1); addItem(995, 250000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10114, 1 )); deleteItem(10114, getItemSlot(10114), 1); addItem(995, 200000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10113, 1 )); deleteItem(10113, getItemSlot(10113), 1); addItem(995, 150000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10112, 1 )); deleteItem(10112, getItemSlot(10112), 1); addItem(995, 100000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10091, 1 )); deleteItem(10091, getItemSlot(10091), 1); addItem(995, 160000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10090, 1 )); deleteItem(10090, getItemSlot(10090), 1); addItem(995, 102000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10096, 1 )); deleteItem(10096, getItemSlot(10096), 1); addItem(995, 186000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10094, 1 )); deleteItem(10094, getItemSlot(10094), 1); addItem(995, 140000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10098, 1 )); deleteItem(10098, getItemSlot(10098), 1); addItem(995, 151000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10097, 1 )); deleteItem(10097, getItemSlot(10097), 1); addItem(995, 176000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10093, 1 )); deleteItem(10093, getItemSlot(10093), 1); addItem(995, 150000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10095, 1 )); deleteItem(10095, getItemSlot(10095), 1); addItem(995, 1000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(10092, 1 )); deleteItem(10092, getItemSlot(10092), 1); addItem(995, 5000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15150, 1 )); deleteItem(15150, getItemSlot(15150), 1); addItem(995, 31000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(16000, 1 )); deleteItem(16000, getItemSlot(16000), 1); addItem(995, 150000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15114, 1 )); deleteItem(15114, getItemSlot(15114), 1); addItem(995, 102000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15112, 1 )); deleteItem(15112, getItemSlot(15112), 1); addItem(995, 50000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15116, 1 )); deleteItem(15116, getItemSlot(15116), 1); addItem(995, 75000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15111, 1 )); deleteItem(15111, getItemSlot(15111), 1); addItem(995, 13000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15115, 1 )); deleteItem(15115, getItemSlot(15115), 1); addItem(995, 9000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15113, 1 )); deleteItem(15113, getItemSlot(15113), 1); addItem(995, 5000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15117, 1 )); deleteItem(15117, getItemSlot(15117), 1); addItem(995, 107000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15338, 1 )); deleteItem(15338, getItemSlot(15338), 1); addItem(995, 130000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15339, 1 )); deleteItem(15339, getItemSlot(15339), 1); addItem(995, 98000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15340, 1 )); deleteItem(15340, getItemSlot(15340), 1); addItem(995, 113000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15343, 1 )); deleteItem(15343, getItemSlot(15343), 1); addItem(995, 98000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15341, 1 )); deleteItem(15341, getItemSlot(15341), 1); addItem(995, 76000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15342, 1 )); deleteItem(15342, getItemSlot(15342), 1); addItem(995, 32000000); if(playerHasItemAmount(15337, 1 )); deleteItem(15337, getItemSlot(15337), 1); addItem(995, 122000000); sendMessage("Enjoy Your Money!!!"); teleportToX = 2461; teleportToY = 3176; } else { sendMessage("You need to be a member to sell custom items."); } break;

When I compile I get no errors, but when I use the portal it always gives me max cash instead of how much the items are worth. Also, if I use the portal without any of the items listed in the code it still gives me money. Can someone help me fix this code to make it work?

Read full topic
